search.title: Semiconductor industry
search.snippet: The semiconductor industry is the aggregate of companies engaged in the design and fabrication of semiconductors and semiconductor devices, such as transistors

search.title: Foundry model
search.snippet: known as fabless semiconductor companies, only design devices; merchant or pure play foundries only manufacture devices for other companies, without designing

search.title: Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corporation
search.snippet: Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corporation (SMIC) is a partially state-owned publicly listed Chinese pure-play semiconductor foundry company

search.title: Fabless manufacturing
search.snippet: third parties. Prior to the 1980s, the semiconductor industry was vertically integrated. Semiconductor companies owned and operated their own silicon-wafer
